author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA'S EYE APPROACHING THE SOUTHWESTERN COAST OF JAMAICA... ...STAY IN YOUR SHELTER... ...1200 PM EDT POSITION UPDATE...
summary: ...MELISSA'S EYE APPROACHING THE SOUTHWESTERN COAST OF JAMAICA... ...STAY IN YOUR SHELTER... ...1200 PM EDT POSITION UPDATE... As of 12:00 PM EDT Tue Oct 28 the center of Melissa was located near 18.0, -78.0 with movement NNE at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 892 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 185 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
